We recently launched a new plugin that allows you to quickly add people to your prospects list from any website.
This plugin is a great addition to our LeadHub 2.0 platform, which has been a game-changer for many businesses.
The plugin-in also offers a data enrichment service that allows you to engage with your prospects directly from your LinkedIn profile.
This service can help you build your target accounts & prospects, making sure they are listed properly.
